On the throttle actuators  the two banks of throttle actuators driving the individual throttle bodies generally donâ€™t melt per se but more commonly with time  the plastic gears actually doing the throttle actuation do slip and spin  while not opening the throttles. Some owners upgrade to metal gears  while others change them out every 3-4 years. Cost each is probably slightly more than S$1K.
